decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - Separate access to the residential accommodation on the upper floors of the premises shall be available to residents at all times.
Condition : 5 - 5.	The approved floor space to the dental surgery shall be used as ancillary office and staff room and shall not be used as a surgery room.

Condition : 6 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of   8am          to     6pm        on Mondays to Friday and    9am       to      1pm     on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and public holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 7 - 7.	No windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the northern wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to Dental Practice.
